title: Add readmes to NuGet packages
body:
NuGet.org now [prominently features READMEs][1]. The NuGet packages MSBuild produces should use this to highlight a few things:

1. Links to the docs.
2. Which packages are the right ones to reference for task authors.
2. Which packages are more or less "internal implementation details" (`Runtime`) and what you should use instead (MSBuildLocator).

After we get a draft out we should see if we can get some of @ghogen's time for editing.

[1]: https://devblogs.microsoft.com/nuget/introducing-the-new-nuget-org-package-details-page/
